item.title: Cloud Resume
item.description: Inspired by the AWS Cloud Resume Challenge Link Certifications Link Professional Experience Systems Administrator, Technical Solutions Engineer, IT Consultant Fixed Computing Aug 2014 - Present Over a seven-year period, designed and executed comprehensive technical infrastructures for three separate graduate film program sites for Mount Saint Maryâ€™s University. Managed a broad scope that included low-voltage, network infrastructure, end-user devices, on-premise servers, cloud systems, software management, technical support, multimedia studios, AV systems, and educational labs.
